alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Jackson; Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gallia, south central Jackson and Lawrence Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of South Webster, or 8 miles north of Lake Vesuvius, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ashland, Ironton, Coal Grove, Lake Vesuvius, Vernon, Waterloo, Aid, and Pedro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
